title: Software Engineer II, Backend, Meet Media
company_industry: Information Services and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**Minimum qualifications:**
* Bachelor’s degree or equivalent practical experience.
* 1 year of experience with software development in one or more programming languages (e.g., Python, C, C++, Java, JavaScript).
* 1 year of experience with data structures or algorithms.


**Preferred qualifications:**
* Experience working with web/mobile application development, Unix/Linux environments, distributed and parallel systems, machine learning, information retrieval, natural language processing, networking, or similar.
* Experience developing accessible technologies.
* Excellent problem solving skills.


**About The Job**
 Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.
   

  

 Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Write product or system development code.
* Review code developed by other developers and provide feedback to ensure best practices (e.g., style guidelines, checking code in, accuracy, testability, and efficiency).
* Contribute to existing documentation or educational content and adapt content based on product/program updates and user feedback.
* Triage product or system issues and debug/track/resolve by analyzing the sources of issues and the impact on hardware, network, or service operations and quality.
* Develop infrastructure that supports Meet's need for cloud-side audio and video processing.


 Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

title: Senior Software Engineer
company_industry: Broadcast Media Production and Distribution, Technology, Information and Media, and Movies, Videos, and Sound
description:
**Senior Software Engineer** 




**Sweden - Stockholm - Remote** 




**Permanent Position** 




**Salary - €80,000 annual equivelent** 




  





**Join a Leading Innovator in Media Technology** 




 Are you a software engineer passionate about revolutionizing media workflows? This is your opportunity to work with a trailblazing organization shaping the future of content creation and live event production. They provide cutting-edge solutions that enable seamless media workflows and empower the next generation of video streaming technologies.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 We’re looking for a
 **Senior Software Engineer** 
 with deep expertise in C++ and network programming. In this role, you’ll work on advanced broadcast video streaming technologies, driving innovation in video encoding/decoding and media transport systems. If you’re energized by the challenge of delivering low-latency, high-quality streaming solutions, we want to hear from you!
 



  





**What You’ll Do** 



* Design and develop high-performance software for
 **video streaming applications.**
* Implement and optimize video encoding/decoding and muxing solutions, such as
 **H.264, H.265, and MPEG-TS.**
* Enhance streaming media systems through advanced network programming.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate video streaming protocols and services.
* Continuously improve system performance, scalability, and reliability.



  





**What We’re Looking For** 



* Strong expertise in C++ and network programming.
* Hands-on experience with video encoding, decoding, and muxing technologies (e.g., H.264, H.265, MPEG-TS).
* Proven success in developing software for streaming media applications.
* A solid understanding of network protocols and media transport systems.



  





 If you’re ready to make an impact in a fast-paced, creative environment where your contributions directly influence the future of video streaming, we’d love to connect!
 



  





 5V Video are acting as an Employment Agency for the purposes of this job vacancy. We offer a reward scheme if you can recommend someone for this position, up to €250 for you and an additional €250 to a charity of your choice, 5V Video are recognised talent solutions experts within Video and Broadcast Technology working across Europe, the UK and North America.

title: Android Developer
description:
Marshall Group is the audio, tech, and design powerhouse uniting musicians and music lovers through genre-breaking innovation. Our flagship brand, Marshall, is uniquely positioned with over 60 years of rock ‘n’ roll attitude on stage, at home, and on the go. Our iconic products are brought to life by a dedicated team of 800 passionate employees and sold in over 90 markets worldwide.
   

  

**Right now,** 
 we need to strengthen our Software team with a Android developer that will be working with our cross-functional teams. The world of audio is changing. Smart speakers and True Wireless headphones are turning audio into a high-tech industry. In the last few years, our products have gone from simple wired devices to connected and complex IoT devices. We are now focusing on evolving our mobile app and the added value it can provide to our users.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Maintain and develop Android mobile apps for the Marshall brands
* Collaborate closely with our UX and Design team to discuss new features and functions.
* Support and participate in testing activities and evaluation of the app.
* Participate in knowledge-sharing sessions to promote new ideas and innovation.
* Teamwork with the other developers to help us brainstorm solutions and make our apps even better for our users.
* Prototyping new ideas to make them come true, both individually and across teams.


**Who We’re Looking For**
 You are an Android developer with a collaborative mindset who cooperates well internally and externally. To succeed in this role, you need to be committed to collaborative problem-solving, and build quality products to create great user experiences together with the UX and design team. We believe you have a great passion for new technologies, trends, and software development. You get excited by the idea of creating an amazing app experience that resonates with people not only on a functional level but also on an emotional level.
   

  

**You Probably Have The Following Experiences & Skills**
* + 2 years of proven professional Android app development experience.
* Experience working with Kotlin.
* Proficient in modern android design patterns (for ex. MVVM, dependency injection) and Jetpack components.
* Familiarity with coroutines and Compose, Dagger Hilt and Clean Architecture.
* Good understanding of Firebase & REST etc.
* Hence strong written and spoken English skills are essential.
* Experience with Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) is a plus.


**Our Pledge**
 We thrive to foster an inclusive workplace and we do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, disability, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age or marital status. We firmly believe that Marshall thrives when our employees do, leading to better experiences for our consumers.
   

  

 We encourage applications from all over the world. To enable transitioning from another country for a role at Marshall, we offer re-location support. This support is tailored for each role but always includes visa/work permit application, local authority registration, and home finding service. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.
   

  

**Does this sound like you?**
 We look forward to reviewing your application!

title: Tech Lead & Senior Python Developer
description:
**The Role** 




 Join our team as a
 **Tech Lead & Senior Python Developer** 
 , where you’ll play a pivotal role in shaping the technical foundation of our platform. Reporting directly to the CTO, you will lead backend development efforts, ensure system reliability, and mentor a growing team of engineers. This is a unique opportunity to make a significant impact on a fast-scaling platform while fostering best practices in backend engineering.
 



  





 This role requires hands-on expertise in Python (FastAPI), backend systems, and cloud-based architecture, alongside strong leadership skills to guide the team toward innovative, scalable solutions.
 



  





 You have to be living in Sweden and speak fluent Swedish.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





**Backend Architecture & Development:** 



* Design and develop scalable, reliable backend systems using Python.
* Create and optimize RESTful APIs, integrations, and core platform features.
* Solve complex engineering problems to support high availability and performance.



  





**Technical Leadership:** 



* Lead the engineering team in adopting best practices in Python development and software architecture.
* Mentor junior developers, fostering skill development and collaboration.
* Drive technical decisions and roadmap planning with the CTO and stakeholders.



  





**Code Quality & Best Practices:** 



* Enforce clean, maintainable code standards through thorough code reviews.
* Advocate for test-driven development (TDD) and continuous integration workflows.



  





**Collaboration & Communication:** 



* Work closely with cross-functional teams to align technical objectives with business goals.
* Partner with product managers to define requirements and deliver innovative solutions.
* Collaborate with DevOps engineers to ensure smooth deployment pipelines and system reliability.



  





**Cloud Infrastructure & Security:** 



* Architect and maintain robust, scalable cloud solutions on AWS or similar platforms.
* Implement security measures to safeguard backend systems and data integrity.



  





**Security:** 



* Enforce best practices for infrastructure and backend security.
* Implement tools and protocols to safeguard systems and data.



  





**Monitoring & Optimization:** 



* Leverage monitoring tools to ensure system health, identifying and resolving performance bottlenecks.
* Continuously refine and enhance backend workflows for efficiency and scalability



  





 Required Skills and Qualifications
 


* **6+ years** 
 of hands-on experience in backend development with a strong focus on Python.
* Deep expertise in Python frameworks (e.g., FastAPI).
* Proficient in designing and managing scalable architectures with NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB).
* Strong understanding of RESTful APIs, microservices architecture, and system design.
* Hands-on experience with cloud platforms like AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda) or Google Cloud.
* Advanced knowledge of containerization tools (Docker) and orchestration (Kubernetes).
* Familiarity with CI/CD tools and workflows (e.g., GitLab CI, Jenkins).
* Proven ability to lead and mentor technical teams.
* Exceptional problem-solving skills with a proactive mindset.
* Strong communication skills to articulate complex technical concepts.



  





**Why Join Us?** 



* **Lead with Impact:** 
 Shape the technical strategy and contribute to a platform that connects thousands of players and clubs worldwide.
* **Growth Opportunities:** 
 Work directly with the CTO and a dynamic team, taking ownership of technical leadership and backend excellence.
* **Hybrid Flexibility:** 
 Enjoy a mix of remote and in-office work, with at least 2 days in-office per week.
* **Innovative Environment:** 
 Be part of a forward-thinking team that values collaboration and continuous improvement.



  





**About Padel Mates** 




 Padel Mates is revolutionizing sports matchmaking and club management. Our platform connects players and clubs through seamless solutions, offering an effortless experience for finding matches, managing bookings, and more.
 



  





 We’re on a mission to empower people to enjoy sports, create meaningful connections, and thrive in a supportive community. Join us in reshaping the future of sports technology!
 



  





**How to Apply** 




 Send your CV to feras@padelmates.se or apply directly on LinkedIn. Share examples of your work, projects, or achievements that demonstrate your expertise in backend development and DevOps practices.

title: Senior Embedded Software Engineer
company_industry: Technology, Information and Media, Spectator Sports, and Entertainment Providers
description:
**Play a crucial role to integrate our ground-breaking tracking software with our camera platform** 




  





**WANT TO REVOLUTIONIZE GOLF?** 




  





**Our mission** 
 is to help people enjoy the wonderful game of golf even more by developing tracing technology for TV and gamification to ranges. Our product brings people together and encourages them to get active which enables a healthier lifestyle. Our range technology is used globally and millions of people spend their quality time bonding and playing with their family and friends. Our broadcast technology is aired worldwide and makes the tournaments really enjoyable for the TV viewers. ⛳️ 📺 🎥
 



  





**At our new office** 
 , you can expect to meet humble, helpful and driven colleagues. You will join an organization where everyone has a voice and can make an impact. You'll have the opportunity to contribute to something meaningful as we undergo exciting changes and growth. We are committed to creating an environment where you can grow professionally and individually. As well as creating a social work environment by creating fun activities like morning fika, gym sessions, mob programming, after-work, table tennis, and golf simulator sessions to name a few! 🥳 🏓 ☕️
 



  





**We are proud** 
 to be on a journey where we're focused on helping people worldwide improve their golf game which leads to healthy, active and social lifestyles. All of our products are developed, tested and deployed from our newly renovated R&D office in Stockholm, Sweden. Join us at Toptracer Technologies and be part of a team dedicated to creating positive change through technology and innovation! 🚀 💻 💙
 



  





**THE ROLE** 




 Toptracer is currently looking for an experienced Embedded Software Engineer to our embedded platform team. You will play a crucial role to integrate our ground-breaking tracking software with our camera platform. Together with your team you will have opportunities to shape the architecture and design of our next-generation ball tracking system, serving thousands of Toptracer golf ranges all over the world.
 



  





**POSSIBILITIES** 



* Opportunity to develop a crucial part of Toptracer’s technology and possibility to innovate and have influence on the technical and architectural roadmap.
* Provide technical guidance and mentorship to other members of the team.
* Collaborate in cross-functional initiatives together with teams of experienced algorithm, hardware and software engineers.
* Join a unique company culture that emphasizes fun, caring, and teamwork.



  





**WE BELIEVE YOU HAVE** 



* A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, or a related field.
* Proven experience in programming embedded devices and building an embedded Linux system from scratch.
* Experience with writing Linux kernel drivers.
* Experience with designing embedded systems with foolproof boot and software upgrade capabilities.
* Strong proficiency in modern software engineering principles and practices.
* Solid knowledge and long experience with C and C++.
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
* A solid understanding and practical experience of embedded architectures.
* Effective ways to communicate and strong collaboration skills.



  





**IT`S ALSO GREAT IF YOU** 



* Worked with Yocto or other tools to build customized Linux systems.
* Experience with FPGA programming.
* Worked with video for Linux (V4L2) framework.
* Experience with bare metal OS less or RTOS programming.
* Some experience with video processing.



  





**MORE ABOUT TOPTRACER** 




  





**Workplace** 




  





 We value fully engaged associates who come to work because they enjoy their work and the colleagues they have. We strive to create a diverse and inclusive work environment where everybody can reach their full potential. We provide opportunities for all the colleagues to develop internally and to meet each other. We have a strong commitment and dedication at Toptracer. That comes from the activities and moments we share together and the product we are developing.
 



  





 In addition to that, our technology is unique and world-leading which makes the journey extra exciting. We create a product that encourages people to be outside and get activated which enables a healthier lifestyle. As a colleague at Toptracer, you can either go to a range near your home to experience the product you have developed or just turn on the TV to see it in the biggest golf tournaments.
 



  





**Culture** 




 Our culture is driven by our mission to create moments that matter for everyone and our values for Caring, Courage, One Team, Fun and Excellence.
 



  





**Activities** 



* After-work
* Pair/Mob programming
* Conference
* Dart
* Gym sessions
* Table-tennis
* Golf simulator
* Golf tournaments



  





**Benefits** 



* Competitive salary and benefits package.
* Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies and projects.
* Collaborative and innovative work environment.
* Professional development and growth opportunities.
* A hybrid work environment with the primary workplace at our cozy and welcoming office in Mörby Centrum, Danderyd.
* And of course, play golf!



  





 The position is permanent and full-time, located at our office in Stockholm. We hope to hear from you soon!

title: Software Configuration Engineer
description:
At Eaton we are continuously striving to make our world safer, sustainable and efficient in power management. We believe in our employees and we can achieve our goals together. We make what matters work! Join us and help us provide energy-efficient solutions that make a real impact.
   

  

 To find out more about us check: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=baa\_aiJ4L7
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 As Software Configuration Engineer you will be part of an EMEA based team and deliver high level technical support on various client sites across Sweden and EMEA. Your will be mainly working on Energy Power Management System (EPMS), Datacenter Infrastructure Management (DCIM) and SCADA related Eaton software solutions for customer projects. You will bring domain expertise to contribute to following areas of activity of Software based projects:
   

  

* Coordinate SW site deployment and testing (with onsite works if needed) of Eaton solutions in different electrical infrastructures (like data centers, C&I, etc).
* Design technical scope of budgetary and binding proposals
* Resolve the Level 3 escalated technical support requests related to area of expertise.
* Define SW deployment work method with criteria for local team and 3rd party
* Support sales & project management teams with technical scope definition and highlight risks with solutions
* Produce and validate engineering documentation in cooperation with various Eaton technical teams
* Perform internal and external technical presentations and training, also participate in process and tool standardization initiatives.


**Qualifications**
* Degree or equivalent from an accredited institution in Power management/Electrical engineering/Computer science/Automation subjects.
* Experience with Power system automation software, Energy power management system, Data Center Infrastructure management.
* Relevant engineering experience with power management systems specifically within Data Center environment
* Familiar with power distribution system including MV/LV switchgear, Transformer, UPS and EPMS/DCIM system is a plus
* Software and hardware knowledge of PLC, HMI, Network Infrastruction, IED programming and logic control concept is a plus.
* Strong collaboration and solid communication skills in English, other European languages are plus
* Self driven and solution oriented behaviour when solving high complexity technical problems
* A strong safety mindset and the fortitude to STOP unsafe practices even when that could impact other important deliverables
* Intercultural awareness, ability to prioritize and efficiently deal with multiple tight deadlines
* Flexibility with traveling within Sweden and EMEA
* Driving license


**What We Can Offer You**
* Competitive compensation and benefits package.
* Permanent contract in a fast-growing global company.
* Challenging projects in dynamic collaborative team.
* Flexible working solutions.
* We make ethics and culture matter – You will enjoy working in supportive and collaborative workplace where ethics and safety are in our DNA.
* We make your aspirations matter – Eaton encourages internal promotion, whenever possible.
* We make your growth matter - We invest in our employees for the long term – not just with salary and benefits, but with ongoing learning and development opportunities made available through Eaton University.


 We are committed to ensuring equal employment opportunities for job applicants and employees. Our recruitment processes use balanced selection criteria and avoid unlawful discrimination against applicants on the basis of their age, colour, disability, marital status, national origin, gender, gender identity, genetic information, race or racial origin, religion, sexual orientation or any other status protected or required by law.
   

  

 ]]>

title: Senior Fullstack Developer, GCP
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Business Consulting and Services
description:
What makes Cognizant a unique place to work? The combination of rapid growth and an international and innovative environment! This is creating a lot of opportunities for people like YOU — people with an entrepreneurial spirit who want to make a difference in this world.
   

  

 At Cognizant, together with your colleagues from all around the world, you will collaborate on creating solutions for the world's leading companies and help them become more flexible, more innovative, and successful. And this is your chance to be part of the success story: we are looking for a Full stack developer to join our Developer Experience Team in Skåne, Sweden.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a skilled and motivated Full stack developer to join our Digital Engineering team. As a Developer, you will play a crucial role in enhancing our development and deployment processes. The ideal candidate possesses a strong background in GCP, React, Node JS, Microservices, multicloud experience, DevOps practices, CI/CD methodologies, and has extensive experience working with Agile Methodology.
   

  

 The role is situated in Skåne, preferably in Malmö, Lund, or Helsingborg.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Development and maintenance of applications on React, Node JS, Microservices
* Maintaining DevOps pipeline
* Mulitcloud experience like Google Cloud, Ali Cloud etc.,


**Our ideal candidate**
* The ideal candidate possesses a strong background in Front-end application development, DevOps practices, CI/CD methodologies, and agile way of working.
* Work experience as a full-stack developer within Google Cloud Platform with React JS.
* Expert in Front-end application development using React JS.
* Good implementation knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes & Ali Cloud
* Experience in setting up DevOps pipeline.


**What You Can Expect**
* Become part of a the ´flag ship´ success story – We go through enormous growth!
* Based in the Nordics - we have offices in Sweden, Norway, Denmark and Finland in a European and Global Network.
* Organization driven by technology – We have a tremendous technology backbone.
* Open, ´can do´ team spirit.
* Environment where you can make your own ideas reality.
* To work on various challenging client and projects and distributed team structure.

title: Javautvecklare till Samtrafiken
description:
Var med på resan mot ett hållbart samhälle och skapa världens smartaste kollektivtrafik.
 



  





 Med hjälp av data och digitalisering finns stora möjligheter att göra det enklare för resenärer att välja kollektivtrafik framför bil eller flyg 
 



  





 Har du som Javautvecklare funderat på vad du skulle kunna arbeta med och samtidigt bidra i klimatomställningen? 
 



  





**Om tjänsten** 




 Som Javautvecklare hos oss ingår du i ett team av kompetenta utvecklare. Ni ansvarar för att utveckla och förvalta applikationer som täcker allt från framtida digitaliseringslösningar till befintliga system. Nyutvecklingen drivs av en "Cloud first"-strategi, där vi i nya projekt använder oss av AWS-tjänster. Du deltar i arbetet med gemensamma verktyg och plattformar för utveckling och test samt anpassar dessa för att främja effektivitet och kvalitet. Du stöttar även projekt och förvaltningar i att tillämpa dessa lösningar och deltar i strategiskt viktiga projekt. 
 



 Tillsammans med teamet ansvarar du för hela processen – från infrastruktur och arkitektur till att skriva kod och produktionssätta. Du har stora möjligheter att påverka val av verktyg och tekniker. Här får din nyfikenhet och ditt teknikintresse blomstra! Rollen innefattar också dokumentation av lösningar för att säkerställa kunskapsdelning och kontinuitet. 
 



  





**Kompetens och erfarenhet** 




 Vi söker dig som har: 
 


* Relevant utbildning inom datavetenskap, systemvetenskap eller motsvarande erfarenhet.
* Erfarenhet som systemutvecklare, främst inom Java.
* Erfarenhet av Terraform, Jira, Bitbucket, IntelliJ IDEA, Microsoft SQL Server, Maven, Docker är meriterande.
* Erfarenhet av AWS-tjänster som ECS och RDS är ett stort plus.
* Erfarenhet från boknings-, biljett-, eller betalsystem, eller system för kollektivtrafiken värderas högt.
* Intresse av utveckling med hjälp av AI, exempelvis genom användning av verktyg som ChatGPT, Claude, AWS Q eller GitHub Copilot. Erfarenhet av att integrera AI-lösningar i molnbaserade miljöer är också värdefullt.
* Goda språkkunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.



  





**Personliga egenskaper** 




 Du är nyfiken, strukturerad och självgående, samtidigt som du trivs med att samarbeta i grupp. Du uppskattar en arbetsmiljö där du får vara med hela vägen – från utveckling till drift – och ta ansvar för produktionssatta system. 
 



  





**Övrigt** 




 På Samtrafiken får du vara med och bidra till samhällsnytta och hållbarhet i en spännande framtidsbransch. Hos oss får du en känsla av det lilla bolaget i det stora sammanhanget. Våra kärnvärden är: expertis att lita på, proaktivitet i samverkan och inkluderande gemenskap.  
 



 Vår arbetsplats präglas av en familjär stämning och vi ser till att ha roligt tillsammans. Vi bryr oss om varandra, hjälper varandra att utvecklas och det finns en genuin omtanke om personalen.  
 



 Centralt i Stockholm, vägg i vägg med Stockholms Centralstation, hittar du vårt kontor. Vi arbetar från kontoret och på distans – du avgör till stor del fördelningen samtidigt som det alltid är verksamheten som styr. 
 



  





**För mer information och ansökan** 




 Skicka ditt CV och personligt brev till jobb@samtrafiken.se. Vi intervjuar löpande så avvakta inte med in ansökan. 
 



 För frågor kring tjänsten kontakta gärna Kristian Dahlander, gruppchef, tel. +46 76-136 76 68 eller kristian.dahlander@samtrafiken.se. Intervjuer sker löpande så skicka in din ansökan så snart som möjligt. 
 



 Vi undanber oss vänligen kontakt från bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag. 
 



  





**Om Samtrafiken** 




*Samtrafiken är ett samverkans- och utvecklingsföretag inom kollektivtrafikbranschen. Genom att koppla samman landets offentliga och privata trafikaktörer skapar vi mervärde* 
  
 



*för hela branschen. Med våra tjänster, bland annat Resplus, gör vi det enkelt att söka, köpa och resa med kollektivtrafik i Sverige. Vi verkar samtidigt för att det hållbara resandet ökar och för merintäkter hos våra ägare. Vi ägs av alla regionala kollektivtrafikmyndigheter samt många av de kommersiella trafikoperatörerna med nationell trafik. Tillsammans når vi längre. www.samtrafiken.se.*

title: Integration specialist
description:
Nu söker vi vår nästa ledare med flera års erfarenhet av att bygga integrationslösningar. Vi är ett team på 11 utvecklare som jobbar i
 *C#/.NET-stacken och drivs av uppdrag med mycket logik och avancerade integrationer. Om du vill bygga unikt anpassade lösningar och vara en ledare i leverans- då är vi rätt gäng för dig!*
****Vad ingår i jobbet som integrationsspecialist på Accigo?****
 Som integrationsspecialist hos oss bygger du nya API:er i C#/.NET och är väl bevandrad i de tekniker som Azure Integration Services erbjuder. Du tar en ledande roll i leverans och har stor möjlighet att påverka och tycka till gällande olika teknikval – vilket är något som vi både uppmuntrar och uppskattar.
   

  

 Du kommer även att utveckla och underhålla befintliga kundlösningar i förvaltningsåtaganden. Rollen är dynamisk och bjuder på variationsrika och spännande tekniska utmaningar med stora möjligheter att utveckla dina kunskaper och bredda din erfarenhet utifrån dina egna ambitioner.
   

  

 Några exempel på vad du kan komma arbeta med:
   

  

* Designa och skapa integrationslösningar i Microsoft Azure
* Designa och skapa API:er och fasader för integrationer
* Arbeta självständigt i mindre uppdrag
* Leda utvecklingsteam


**Vi söker dig som**
* Under ca 5+ år har jobbat med C# och byggt API:er
* Tycker att CI/CD är lika självklart som att solen går upp varje dag
* Har stor kunskap inom Microsoft Azure utifrån att bygga integrationslösningar
* Är erfaren inom Azure integration services (Logic Apps, Azure functions, API Management, Azure services bus, data factory och event grid)
* Tycker om och har erfarenhet av att bygga komplexa lösningar med fokus på logik
* Är van att jobba och leda i agil scrum-process


**Det är meriterande om du dessutom har**
* Erfarenhet av att arbetat med BizTalk eller liknande integrationsmotor
* Erfarenhet av konsultrollen


 Vem är du?
   

  

 Du är en team-player som antagligen gillar att umgås mycket med dina kollegor. För att lyckas på Accigo är det viktigt att du är kommunikativ, nyfiken och prestigelös.
   

  

 Du är en problemlösare som vågar testa nya tankar, perspektiv och tekniker.
   

  

 Du är en naturlig coach åt andra som förstår skillnaden mellan att ge kritik och konstruktiv feedback. Sist men inte minst, strävar du alltid efter att göra ditt bästa i alla lägen.
   

  

 Vårt team, här är det högt i taket!
   

  

 Vårt affärsområde som vi internt kallar Custom Development & Integration är ett team på 12 medarbetare, var av 11 utvecklare och en affärsledare som mer än ofta är ute hos kunderna och projektleder eller kravställer nya spännande lösningar.
   

  

 För oss är laganda och glädje jätteviktigt och vi ser därför till att hitta på roliga aktiviteter med teamet både på och utanför arbetstid.
   

  

 Det ska vara kul att jobba och alla ska ha möjlighet att utvecklas i linje med sin egen ambition. Det innebär att vi arbetar med många utmanande och spännande projekt i ett lagom tempo. Hos oss är det bara din egen ambition och lust som sätter gränsen för hur mycket du kan utvecklas!
   

  

**Nyfiken?** 
 Vi svarar gärna på frågor, eller berättar mer om oss över en kaffe - du kan enkelt komma i kontakt med oss: elin.yamada@accigo.se
   

  

 Accigo är ett nordiskt konsultbolag som hjälper företag och organisationer med digital affärs- och verksamhetsutveckling med tekniken som möjliggörare. För oss handlar digitalisering till 90% om människor och 10% om teknik. Det är när samspelet mellan människa och teknik fungerar som digitaliseringens fulla styrka visar sig.
   

  

 För många handlar digitalisering mest om teknik. För oss är det så otroligt mycket större. Digitalisering kan få både människor och organisationer att våga sikta högre, följa sina drömmar och öppna dörrar som de inte ens visste fanns. Och när man ser igenom tekniken och börjar skönja vilka möjligheter som gömmer sig där bakom. Då ser man att framtiden kan vara en fantastisk plats – fylld av mänsklig energi och värme – och digitalisering är inget annat än vår superkraft för att komma dit.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**Position Overview:**  

We are seeking a skilled and experienced System Testing Specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in system testing, a deep understanding of agile principles, and expertise in test automation frameworks. If you are passionate about digital services, possess excellent analytical and communication skills, and thrive in a collaborative environment, we want to hear from you.
  
  

**Key Responsibilities:**  

Perform system testing and ensure the delivery of high-quality digital services.
  
Utilize test automation frameworks and tools such as Selenium, Cypress, or UI Automation.
  
Conduct API testing using tools like Insomnia or Postman, with knowledge of microservices.
  
Lead initiatives and think creatively to solve complex problems.
  
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, demonstrating strong people skills and a service-minded attitude.
  
Present findings and insights effectively to stakeholders.
  
  

**Competence Profile and Qualifications:**  

Minimum of 5 years of experience in system testing or a similar role.
  
Strong knowledge of agile principles and practices.
  
Hands-on experience with digital services and software testing life cycles.
  
Expertise in at least one Test Management Tool.
  
Proficiency in Python is a plus.
  
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
  
Analytical mindset with the ability to lead and motivate others.
  
Fluency in English is required; proficiency in Swedish is a plus.

title: Chief Technology Officer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Our mission is to put useful AI in the hands of knowledge workers. Quantera is dedicated to changing the way research of done. Financial data is scattered, unstructured and not made to be accessible. Insights from simplifying complex data to help them make smarter knowledge work and informed decisions are made. Based in Stockholm, our mission is to provide accessible and actionable information to empower individual investors. We are remote first, people over location is how we think about talent.
 



  





**Job Type:** 





 Full time/
 
 Half time
 



  





**Role Description** 




 The role of CTO / Co-founder at Quantera.ai is a pivotal role in shaping the future of AI Agents and financial research. You will work closely with the CEO on driving the technology roadmap and the development of useful AI, while responsible for software development, IT strategy, cloud architecture, and product development.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* 8+ years software Development, Tech Strategy, and Architecture design
* Hands-on Programmer who has shipped several software products on all shapes and sizes.
* Comfortable with Designing, developing, and maintaining scalable backend systems within a cloud-based microservices architecture using dotnet and TypeScript.
* Strong programming skills in Python
* Experience with AI/ML first products.
* Strong leadership and have lead a team of developers with a clear strategy
* Entrepreneurial mindset and experience in startups
* Ability to drive innovation and technical excellence
* System Ownership, experience guiding projects through their full lifecycle, ensuring they are robust, scalable, and meet long-term goals.
* Bachelors or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
* Fluent in English, with outstanding written and verbal communication skills.



  





**Great to have:** 



* A strong interest in the stock market and investments and a general understanding of the financial markets.
* Fintech experience with B2B experience.
* Have done the 0 - 1 journey before in a fast growing startup/scale up.



  





 \*This role is not salaried, we are a startup who have just launched. Compensation is equity-based only as of today. You will be at the forefront of an AI-first Fintech company aimed at building the best-in-class tools for our customers.
 



  





 We are a small team, everyone at Quantera is a builder no matter the experience, we make music from a few notes and have learned the art of getting more from less. As we are in our infancy, ready to take on the giants! Are you ready to take the challenge?

title: Systemadministratör inom Linux
description:
Vi söker nu en erfaren (senior) systemadministratör inom Linx som kommer att ansvara för kundens systemmiljö; servrar, klienter, lagring. Det kan vara antingen på fysisk maskinvara eller handla om virtuella Data Center. Rollen omfattar installation, konfiguration, underhåll och felsökning av operativsystem, tjänster, program och maskinvara på både servrar och klienter.
 



 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att bygga vidare på sin karriär.
 



  





**Start:** 
 omgående
 



***Plats:***
 Kista
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 



* Installera, Konfigurera och underhåll olika Linux-distributioner som Ubuntu, CentOS, RHEL, Debian som används i Enterprise-område
* Installera, konfigurera, underhålla och felsökning olika systemtjänster som DNS, RADIUS, NTP, DHCP, LDAP, MySQL, MariaDB, PHP, Apache, Nginx, Puppet, Ansible, NAS, SAN, EMC, NMS-system
* Installera, konfigurera och underhåll olika Linuxprogram som behövs i Telecom Enterprise-miljö. Olika ansökan om IMS och Radio som inte är Ericsson Node-baserad.
* Utveckla en infrastruktur för att ge stöd till alla affärskrav och utföra regelbunden felsökning på system för att lösa alla problem
* Planera, föreslå och implementera olika system för automatisering
* Hårdvaruinventering
* Servicelager
* Dokumentera olika system så att det är förståeligt för andra och hålla den dokumentationen uppdaterad
* Tätt samarbete med STS Stockholmsgrupper, som Network Team, IMS Team och Radio Team



  





**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 



* Erfarenhet av Linux-servrar i virtualiserade miljöer
* Erfarenhet av Linux-servrar i Klustermiljöer
* Erfarenhet av Puppet och Ansible
* Stark problemlösning och kommunikationsförmåga
* Erfarenhet av MySQL och / eller MariaDB
* Mycket goda kunskaper inom Shell, Perl och / eller Python skript



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
 



  





*Mer om oss* 




 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Linköping och Örebro. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Lösningsarkitekt
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Security and Investigations
description:
***Som lösningsarkitekt hos oss har du en nyckelroll hos våra kunder, och du gör skillnad genom att omvandla våra kunders visioner och behov till hållbara IT-lösningar – vill du vara med?***




  





**Om rollen** 




  





 Som lösningsarkitekt har du en bred teknisk bakgrund samtidigt som du förstår verksamhetens behov och utmaningar och kan omsätta dessa till funktionella och icke-funktionella krav. Du kan hantera och mitigera risker, samla intressenter, har goda ledaregenskaper och är en duktig kommunikatör.
 



  





 I rollen kommer du in tidigt in i projekten med uppgiften att förstå verksamhetens mål och behov för att omsätta detta till den lösningsarkitektur som ger mest värde till verksamheten. Du arbetar i tät samverkan med både expertkollegor från Capgemini och kunden, tillsammans med utvecklingsteam, produktägare och kundens övriga intressenter.
 



  





 Vår starka position på marknaden med kunder som är Sveriges största och mest välkända både inom den publika och privata sektorn har gett oss möjligheten till omfattande och spännande åtaganden inom digital transformation. Det utmanar oss att ständigt utvecklas.
 



  





 Vi arbetar professionellt och metodiskt i en lärande miljö och både din teamchef och ditt kompetensteam stöttar dig och din utveckling som konsult. Vi träffas ofta för att utbyta erfarenheter, lära oss nya saker i en bransch som ständigt förändras – och inte minst för att ha kul tillsammans!
 



  





**Vi söker dig med** 




  




* Flera års erfarenhet som lösningsarkitekt
* Bakgrund inom systemutveckling, och vana av att leda andra
* Erfarenhet av arbete med etablerade metodiker och ramverk för arkitektur och agil systemutveckling.
* Högskoleutbildning eller motsvarande
* Goda kunskaper i såväl svenska som engelska



  





**… och erfarenhet eller intresse av:** 




  




* konsultrollen samt av arbete med beslutsfattare
* att verka utifrån kundens perspektiv och förmåga att analysera och utforma arkitektur och systemlösningar baserat på verksamhetens krav, processer och informationsbehov
* molnbaserade lösningar, AI, säkerhet, processautomatisering eller integration
* arbete som lösningsarkitekt i komplexa miljöer, och/eller med lösningar baserade på Salesforce eller Pega.
* Certifierad IT-arkitekt



  





**Vi erbjuder** 




  





 En positiv arbetsmiljö med starkt fokus på innovation och kompetens. Du kommer att arbeta med många av de senaste tekniktrenderna och vara omgiven av duktiga kollegor. På Capgemini blir du en del av en global organisation med starkt kundfokus, samarbetskultur och möjlighet till kontinuerligt lärande och utveckling. Vårt Digital Architecture-team i Stockholm består av ca 20 kollegor som arbetar som Enterprise-, Verksamhets- och lösningsarkitekter hos våra kunder. Capgemini har varit en dominerande aktör inom arkitekturområdet sedan 90-talet, med vårt eget ramverk Integrated Architecture Framework (IAF) och vi bidrar även aktivt till vidareutvecklingen av TOGAF. Vi har ett aktivt, globalt arkitektforum med lokala undergrupper där du kan dra nytta av globala och lokala experter inom arkitektur och även bidra med din egen erfarenhet.
 



  





**Om Capgemini** 




  





 Capgemini är en global partner inom affärs- och tekniktransformation som hjälper organisationer att påskynda deras övergång till en digital och hållbar värld, och samtidigt gör skillnad för företag och samhälle. Det är en ansvarsfull och mångsidig organisation med 340 000 medarbetare i över 50 länder. Med ett starkt arv som sträcker sig över 55 år tillbaka har Capgemini sina kunders förtroende att hjälpa dem frigöra värdet av teknik för att tillgodose hela deras affärsbehov. Capgemini levererar helhetslösningar som utnyttjar styrkan från strategi och design till teknik. Allt drivet av en marknadsledande kapacitet inom AI, moln och data, kombinerat med en djup branschexpertis och ett ekosystem av partners. År 2023 rapporterade Capgemini Group globala intäkter på 22,5 miljarder euro.
 



  





 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com

title: Senior Supply Chain IT Specialist
company_industry: Paper and Forest Product Manufacturing and Packaging and Containers Manufacturing
description:
**Job Description**
 At Billerud we believe that when we have tomorrow in mind, we will do our very best today. It is thanks to our employees that we are a world-leading company within the field of renewable paper and packaging materials. Do you want to realize your true value and work for a sustainable tomorrow? Join us!
   

  

**We are now looking for a Senior Supply Chain IT Specialist**
 At Billerud we have tomorrow in mind. Early 2024 we embarked on a company-wide business transformation journey where we are redesigning our end-to-end processes and supporting applications to create a solid foundation for the future. We are making Billerud easier to work with, better to work for, unlocking our full potential.
   

  

 As a Senior Supply Chain IT Specialist at Billerud you will play an important role in this transformation. The primary assignment is to contribute to the development and implementation of Billerud’s Order-To-Cash (OTC) related processes and system support. You will work in the interface between Supply Chain, Sales and IT. During 2025 the focus will be to build, test and start implementing the new solution and processes.
   

  

**Key tasks**
**Role**
 In this role, you will actively participate in and contribute to the transformation program making Billerud easier to work with, better to work for, unlocking our full potential through:
   

  

* Build, test and implement the structure for the future ERP system landscape within the OTC scope.
* Support the implementation of new ways-of working and OTC business systems (ERP and others) in close co-operation with internal and external stakeholders.
* Turn business needs into functional requirements in the interface between business and IT.


 You will report to Supply Chain Senior Manager Business Support. The team has a strong process focus and operates as a cross-functional unit with the goal of creating structural improvements.
   

  

 The position could be based at any of our sites in Sweden, such as: Gruvön, Skärblacka, Gävle, Frövi, Solna or Karlsborg (Kalix). The role will require some travels to our offices during the program’s implementation phase.
   

  

 At Billerud, we put Safety First. Together we take great pride in our responsibility to contribute to a safe work environment.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 To succeed in this position, we believe you have:
   

  

* University degree in engineering, business administration or equivalent qualifications.
* Solid knowledge and interest in the business - IT interface, and the integration of processes with IT infrastructure.
* Strong experience with SAP implementations in a business environment (end-to-end), e.g. IBP, PPDS, S&D, TM, EWM etc.
* Experience from Supply Chain context such as Sales Order Management, Planning, Outbound Logistics.
* Experience from implementing EDI with a large number of partners at the same time.
* Proven track record of contributing to structured change initiatives in cross-functional organizations, particularly related to OTC and business IT systems.
* Fluency in English is a requirement, both oral and written. Fluency in Swedish is a merit.


**Meritorious**
* Documented experience in managing complex projects with agile methods and change management expertise.
* Experience of senior stakeholder management.


**Personal qualities**
 To succeed in this role we believe that you are solution oriented with a demonstrated ability to execute. You have a strong business acumen and a customer focus mentality, including a service minded approach. You are systematic and have a strong ability to structure, analyze, plan and prioritize. Finally, you are a team player with strong communication skills in a cross-functional organization. Our values are central in our business and we believe that you recognize yourself in: We care for each other and do what we say.
   

  

**Contact**
 If you want to know more about the role you are welcome to contact Frida Egerlid Jenefeldt Supply Chain Senior Manager Business Support at frida.egerlid@billerud.com.
   

  

 If you would like to know more about or recruitment process, please contact Alice Lundberg, Talent Acquisition Partner at alice.lundberg@billerud.com
   

  

**Application information**
 Welcome with your application no later than January 12th, 2025. Ongoing selection may occur in this process.
   

  

 Billerud is an equal opportunity employer. We embrace diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates.
   

  

**Why us?**
* Opportunity to be a part of Billeruds business transformation.
* An opportunity to contribute to a more sustainable future
* Development and career opportunities
* Performance-based bonus, occupational pension and a number of different benefits according to company policy.
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard.


 Our recruitment process will contain: Interviews, recruitment test, references & alcohol- & drug tests.
   

  

**Do you want to help create a sustainable future through your work?**
 At Billerud, we are fully committed to reduce our and our customers carbon footprint by offering high-performance paper and packaging materials. We are convinced that the right solutions can be important tools to help fight climate change. That's why we see it as our responsibility to enable the best packaging choices, for a better tomorrow.
   

  

 Our proud history in the forestry and paper industry goes back more than 150 years. Since then, we’ve grown to what we are today: a world leading company in high-performing paper and packaging materials - passionately committed to sustainability, quality, and customer value. Our materials are the basis of packaging and paper products used by millions of people around the world, 24 hours a day, all year round.
   

  

 We serve customers in more than 100 countries through our three business areas Liquid Packaging Board, Paper and Paper Board. Our nine production units are located in Sweden, USA, and Finland and we have around 6,000 employees in 19 countries. Our annual turnover is approximately SEK 41.2 billion and the share is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm. At Billerud we always put safety first, care for each other, and do what we say.
   

  

**Join us in redefining sustainable packaging and drive meaningful change for a better tomorrow.**

title: ISV Partnerships Manager
description:
**Please note:**
**This role would suit candidates with Enterprise level POS or Payments sales experience.**
**ISV Partnerships Manager** 
 , are you passionate about payments and fintech? Do you want to join one of Europe's technology leading digital payments companies that is transforming the way businesses accept and manage payments? If so, you might be the perfect fit for our team. We are looking for a talented and motivated ISV Partnerships Manager to further develop our ISV (Independent Software Vendor) Partnerships Program and deliver cutting-edge payment solutions to our clients.
   

  

**Why viva.com?**
 Viva.com is Europe's first acquirer powering merchant payments acceptance across 24 countries and 1.165+ devices. With an ECB approved banking license and presence in 24 European markets, Viva.com's Tap on Any Device technology for in-store payments, Smart Checkout payment gateway for online payments, and marketplace payment solution, help European businesses of any size to accept and manage payments how they want. All of Viva.com's technology is built in-house over MS Azure, and is fully scalable, supporting any payment checkout journey.
   

  

 Viva.com provides a seamless, conversion-boosting omnichannel payments platform, featuring acceptance of 40+ payment methods across 17 languages and 9 currencies. Viva.com's ever-expanding financial services' suite includes value added features such as Real-Time Settlement; Offline Payments minimising chances of losing a sale; a Viva.com business debit card to manage corporate expenses, while reducing acceptance fees to as low as 0%; and Merchant Advance.
   

  

**About the Role:**
* Identify new ISV opportunities in Sweden
* Monitor the software market for vendors suitable for the ISV program
* Monitor the verticals to identify the major IT vendors offering services to merchants
* Contact vendors suitable for the ISV program and present the program
* Onboard new ISVs
* Coordinate the communication of the ISV with the TAM team to assist integration work
* Monitor revenue from individual merchants and individual ISVs
* Identify deviations of revenue and trigger corrective actions
* Manage relationships with ISVs
* Conduct regular meetings with the ISVs to review collaboration
* Escalation and internal follow-up on any issues affecting the services offered to ISV merchants
* Monitoring of financial relationship of viva.com with ISVs (invoicing, payments)
* Sales/ISVs meeting preparation & presentation


**Requirements**
* Be accomplished at selling technology solutions through ISV partnerships/channel partners
* Successful tracked record of created partnership
* Ability to identify both business potential and added value in technology-driven commercial solutions
* Hold sound commercial acumen, able to negotiate multi-partner commercial agreements
* Be a strong stakeholder with engagement skills and the ability to interact confidently with a wide variety of people at all levels
* Be able to work independently and as part of a team to deliver parallel projects
* Hold a proven track record of continually meeting and exceeding sales targets
* Desirable although not essential would be a background within POS peripheral sales
* Adept communication skills with both Swedish and English at business level


**Benefits**
* A highly competitive annual salary (based upon experience)
* Sales bonus, paid quarterly for individual sales performance
* Private medical health insurance
* A diverse multi-cultural working environment
* Local office based in Stockholm, Sweden

title: Solution Architect SAP
company_industry: Paper and Forest Product Manufacturing and Packaging and Containers Manufacturing
description:
**Job Description**
 Billerud, a leader in the Paper and Pulp industry, is embarking on a strategic transition to a new Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system SAP S/4HANA. Our aim is to optimize our business processes, improve cross-departmental information flow, and enhance our data management capabilities. It is thanks to our employees that we are a world-leading company within the field of renewable paper and packaging materials. Do you want to realize your true value and work for a sustainable tomorrow? Join us!
   

  

**We are now looking for a Solution Architect SAP to join our team.**
 In this role, you will collaborate closely with internal staff, project teams, and external vendors to ensure the successful implementation and integration of our SAP solutions.
   

  

 You will be part of our newly started Global Shared Application Team with the purpose to maintain and deliver Applications used globally in Billerud Europe and Billerud North America.
   

  

 As a Solution architect you will be overall responsible for our SAP solutions within your specific SAP area, for example Warehouse, Production, Procurement, Finance etc working in close collaboration with business and our external SAP implementation partner.
   

  

**Your Main Tasks Will Be**
* Collaborating with internal staff, project teams, and external vendors to understand business requirements and processes, including dependencies across various domains.
* Comprehending the information architecture and ensuring it aligns with business needs.
* Adhering to the company's architecture principles for the target solution architecture, raising and deciding on any deviations according to the governance model.
* Ensuring the target solution supports multiple regions and business units.
* Documenting the target solution architecture in line with given standards.
* Understanding the current system landscape and integrations to support our transition.
* Evaluating and implementing features from SAP's latest releases, including “Feature Pack Stack” (FPS) for RISE in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition.
* Understanding the entire solution end-to-end, including high-level business processes and their integration with SAP technology.
* Working as an SAP expert, understanding SAP processes end-to-end and how modules fit together.
* Collaborating with Enterprise Architects, Business Process Leads, and various SAP Analysts and Subject Matter Experts.


 This role is based at one of our offices/production units - Solna, Gävle, Frövi, Karlsborg, Gruvön or Skärblacka. The role will require some travelling within Sweden.
   

  

 At Billerud, we put Safety First. Together we take great pride in our responsibility to contribute to a safe work environment. Please read more about our Safety First initiative
   

  

**Qualifications**
**To succeed in this position, we believe you have:**
* Degree in Computer Science, IT, Business Administration, Logistics, or related fields.
* Expert knowledge in SAP, especially SAP S/4HANA MM, IM, and EWM.
* Solid experience of SAP implementations, including 2+ full-cycle projects.
* Strong SAP project and Application Maintenance Management experience, preferably in manufacturing or related industries.
* Experience with both custom-built and ERP systems, and a strong understanding of their integration challenges.
* 10+ years of implementing SAP.
* Functional/technical proficiency with at least 2 full cycle SAP Implementations.
* Proficiency in logistics processes and integration with procurement, manufacturing, and maintenance.
* Cross-module expertise to design end-to-end solutions.
* Fluent in English with excellent communication and presentation skills.
* Meritorious: SAP certifications (S/4HANA SD, MM, EWM) and knowledge of MES systems.


**Personal qualities**
 For us, personality is important. To succeed in this position, we believe you are:
   

  

* Able to work in a cross-functional environment and have strong analytical skills
* Excellent in communication with different resources and roles, both technical and business staff.
* A good team player with strong logical and reasoning skills.
* Willing and available to travel if required.
* Committed to high-quality project and maintenance delivery. Enjoy working in a global environment.


 Our values are central in our business and we believe that you recognize yourself in: We care for each other and We do what we say.
   

  

**Contact**
 If you want to know more about the role you are welcome to contact recruiting manager Katarina Kopkin, Senior Manager Global Shared Applications, Katarina.kopkin@billerud.com or Ann Josefsson, Senior Director Global IT Applications, at ann.josefsson@billerud.com
   

  

 If you have questions about the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact Alice Lundberg, Talent Acquisition Partner, at alice.lundberg@billerud.com
   

  

**Application information**
 Welcome with your application no later than January 12th.
   

  

 Billerud is an equal opportunity employer. We embrace diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and candidates.
   

  

**Why us?**
 Want to be part of a big SAP S4Hana Greenfield implementation and upcoming maintenance organization?
   

  

 An opportunity to contribute to a more sustainable future
   

  

 Development and career opportunities
   

  

 Performance-based bonus, occupational pension and a number of different benefits according to company policy.
   

  

 Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard.
   

  

 Our recruitment process will contain: Interviews, recruitment test, references, alcohol- & drug tests and background check.
   

  

**Do you want to help create a sustainable future through your work?**
 At Billerud, we are fully committed to reduce our and our customers carbon footprint by offering high-performance paper and packaging materials. We are convinced that the right solutions can be important tools to help fight climate change. That's why we see it as our responsibility to enable the best packaging choices, for a better tomorrow.
   

  

 Our proud history in the forestry and paper industry goes back more than 150 years. Since then, we’ve grown to what we are today: a world leading company in high-performing paper and packaging materials - passionately committed to sustainability, quality, and customer value. Our materials are the basis of packaging and paper products used by millions of people around the world, 24 hours a day, all year round.
   

  

 We serve customers in more than 100 countries through our three business areas Liquid Packaging Board, Paper and Paper Board. Our nine production units are located in Sweden, USA, and Finland and we have around 6,000 employees in 19 countries. Our annual turnover is approximately SEK 41.2 billion and the share is listed on Nasdaq Stockholm. At Billerud we always put safety first, care for each other, and do what we say.
   

  

**Join us in redefining sustainable packaging and drive meaningful change for a better tomorrow.**

title: Technical Sales and Customer Success Leader - Europe
description:
For Eaton’s Exertherm business unit, we are looking for a Technical Sales and Customer Success Leader for the European market.
   

  

 Exertherm is the pioneer and technology leader in the space of hotspot detection in Power Distribution networks- 24/7 Continuous Thermal Monitoring (CTM).
   

  

 The role is opened in a hybrid setup for the following locations in Europe: UK/Harpenden, The Netherlands/Hengelo, Germany/Bonn, Austria/Vienna and Sweden/Stockholm.
   

  

 Travel rate across Europe is up to 30 - 50% of the working time.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Define, plan and drive all technical sales and customer success activities within the European Region, train and support in boosting growth of our thermal monitoring solutions, in close collaboration with Regional Sales Leader and the Technical Support Team
* Provide technical pre- and post-sales solutions support to customers and the Exertherm partner network, incl. travel to client sites as required
* Prepare the technical designs and client quotes based on company standards and templates and building good client relationships
* Keep accurate records of all customer support and discussions with partners. Proficiency using customer relationship management (CRM) software, ideally HubSpot
* Drive technical sales efficiency by ensuring appropriate methodical and technical solutions knowledge and product support to internal sales staff
* Ensure know-how sharing and cross-collaboration. Align with engineering and technical support on a regular basis on all support, training and product issues


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s Degree (ideally in electrical/electronic engineering, industrial engineering, computer science, …) or equivalent degree level
* A minimum of 5 years of experience from Industry or an OEM Panel manufacturer, with proven track in driving either Technical Sales, Field Service, Project Management, Installation / Commissioning Services, Technical Business Development
* Expertise with supporting industrial markets in Europe, ideally in the electrification / power systems space is desired
* Both Technical skills (reading and understanding electrical single line and GA drawings) and commercial acumen and understanding are required, including the ability to deal with clients at all levels of management
* Good knowledge and understanding of Health and Safety requirements on sites
* Critical thinker that identifies areas of improvement in own as well as adjacent functional areas
* Well organized with the ability to plan a workload to achieve deadlines and deliver projects to timescales
* Quick, agile, confident, thoughtful, with the ability to bring new thinking and ideas
* Excellent attention to detail, and a collaborative and proactive manner
* Excellent communication skills in English, both written and verbal (additional languages are a plus)
* Availability to travel 50% of the working time


**What We Offer**
* Competitive compensation and benefits package
* Challenging projects in dynamic collaborative team
* Flexible working solutions (remote, flexible working hours, compressed week, part time etc.)
* We make your aspirations matter – Eaton encourages internal promotion, whenever possible
* We make your growth matter - We invest in our employees for the long term – not just with salary and benefits, but with ongoing learning and development opportunities made available through Eaton University
* We make your contributions matter - reliability, safety, efficiency, and sustainability are at the core of our dedication to improving people’s lives and the environment through power management technologies.
* We make your wellbeing matter – We put your health and safety first. Wellness at Eaton is more than a program, it’s about changing the environment by offering the right tools to help empower employees to make that happen


 We are committed to ensuring equal employment opportunities for job applicants and employees. Our recruitment processes use balanced selection criteria and avoid unlawful discrimination against applicants on the basis of their age, colour, disability, marital status, national origin, gender, gender identity, genetic information, race or racial origin, religion, sexual orientation or any other status protected or required by law.
